DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine treatment effective preventing fracture woman postmenopausal osteoporosis
DOC.brief_title: Registrational Study With AMG 785 Treat Postmenopausal Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman osteoporosis , define low bone mineral density Severe osteoporosis Use agent affect bone metabolism History metabolic bone disease ( except osteoporosis ) Vitamin D insufficiency ( vitamin D repletion rescreening permit ) Current hyper hypocalcemia Current , uncontrolled hyper hypothyroidism Current , uncontrolled hyper hypoparathyroidism
DOC.keyword: Osteoporosis , Osteoporosis-Postmenopausal , Bone Diseases-Metabolic , Bone Diseases , Musculoskeletal Diseases
